title: Ticket #3118: Nordugrid ARC job status changes
description:
Folks at Fermi report that some Nordugrid ARC servers have changed the format of the 'INLRMS: ?' job status values, removing the space. One concrete example is korundi.grid.helsinki.fi, which is running ARC 11.05 and nordugrid-arc-1.1.1.

Nordugrid jobs in Condor-G should still complete normally, but Condor won't mark the jobs as running when appropriate. The GridJobStatus job attribute will show the status string as reported by ARC (with or without the space).

Likely fix is to modify the gridmanager to recognize INLRMS job statuses both with and without a space.
remarks:
2012-Jul-11 11:54:18 by burt:
Hi Jaime,

We had some internal conversations within CMS and the OSG factory operations team. We consider the fix for this to be high priority (the factory depends on not just GridJobStatus but also JobStatus to work properly). Please consider this a high-priority request from Fermi, CMS, and the OSG factory team.

- B

2012-Jul-20 11:42:49 by jfrey:
Jeff Dost tested this patch with glideinWMS and reports that it fixes the problems they saw.
2012-Aug-23 14:11:43 by zmiller:
Bulk change of target version from v070802 to v070803 using ./ticket-target-mover.
